availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Matthew Jouet McKinney (Trigg County attorney and Court Clerk)

body.p: Trigg County attorney and Court Clerk. Virginia native. Married Jane B. Watson in 1855. Father of Mary W. McKinney. Trigg County Court Clerk in 1864.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-004-1313. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 1, p. 291. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Cadiz, p. 194. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Cadiz, p. 8. “Matthew Jouet McKinney,” Find A Grave, October 31, 2008, Memorial no. 31019196. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Marriages, Trigg County, 1855.
